content.question: A small block of mass <math alttext="lowercase m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> is moving along a horizontal surface when it collides with a large block of mass <math alttext="uppercase M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>M</mi></math>, which is initially at rest.
